title: Brooklyn and David Beckham dance to Peter Andre's Mysterious Girl
text:
They share a close bond and regularly post updates about each other on their social media.

And Brooklyn Beckham decided to upload a hilarious throwback video of himself and his famous father David dancing to Peter Andre's Mysterious Girl.

Sharing the fun clip to Instagram on Wednesday, the aspiring photographer, 20, captioned the footage with: 'Love you dad x.'

Mysterious Girl: Brooklyn Beckham decided to upload a hilarious throwback video of himself and his famous father David dancing to Peter Andre's Mysterious Girl

In the boozy video, Brooklyn and David can be seen swaying and singing along to the 1995 classic as they enjoy a drink at a candle lit dinner party.

Showing off their dance moves, the father and son don't hold back as they get engrossed in the music.

Yet it's not long until the former footballer decides to prank his son as he playfully knocks his baker boy hat off.

David and his wife Victoria, who married in 1999, have four children together - Brooklyn, 20, Romeo, 17, Cruz, 14, and Harper, eight.

Close bond: Sharing the fun clip to Instagram on Wednesday, the aspiring photographer, 20, captioned the footage with: 'Love you dad x.'

Fun times: In the boozy video, Brooklyn and David can be seen swaying and singing along to the 1995 classic as they enjoy a drink at a candle lit dinner party

Brooklyn's video comes after his mother Victoria Beckham, who is currently promoting her new beauty range in New York, showed off her fun side on Tuesday and shared a hilarious video to Instagram showing off her dance moves.

The designer danced with some of the tourists to the Bee Gees hit Staying Alive with the bright lights of New York on full display behind her.

In the fun video, Victoria embraced the disco era with black flares as she strutted down the street still packed with tourists.

The former Spice Girl was joined by a male pal along with groups of tourists, and even busted some moves with a life-size version of the Sesame Street character Elmo.

Pranked: Yet it's not long until the former footballer decides to prank his son as he playfully knocks his baker boy hat off

Mysterious Girl: Peter Andre rose to fame with his hit 1996 single Mysterious Girl (pictured)

Luckily plenty of the city's tourists were quick to join in on the fun, as they danced along to the iconic Saturday Night Fever hit.

Victoria captioned the playful video: 'Back in New York!! @victoriabeckhambeauty lip launch today!! xxxx Kisses.'

The outing came after Victoria revealed the boozy secret to her healthy lifestyle during a playful appearance on This Morning last week.

Energetic: Brooklyn's video comes after his mother Victoria Beckham, who is currently promoting her new beauty range in New York, showed off her fun side on Tuesday and shared a hilarious video to Instagram showing off her dance moves

Fun: The designer danced with some of the tourists to the Bee Gees hit Staying Alive with the bright lights of the city on full display behind her

The Spice Girl discussed her penchant for tequila and red wine alongside a balanced lifestyle on the show, saying: 'I try to be really really healthy, I expect a lot of myself and my body.

'I have four kids and work a lot, I try to be healthy, fresh fish, fresh vegetables, fruit and I drink a lot of water.

'I am not saying I’m not fun, I am known to drink a few tequilas and a few red wines, it’s that balance. Working out, but having fun is also super important.'

Chic: As ever Victoria put on a stylish display in black flares and a white blouse as she danced along the streets of New York
